articles.title: Las Vegas woman charged with gunning down 3 roommates - Albany Times Union
articles.description:
LAS VEGAS (AP) - A Las Vegas woman is facing multiple murder charges Saturday in the shooting deaths of her three roommates, who lived in what authorities described as a "problem house."
Christine Sanchez, 47, is currently being held in a county jail on three…

articles.title: ICE flies 99 immigrants to Albany jail

articles.title: Teen tried to kill woman during escape from youth prison: cops
articles.description: KLAMATH FALLS, Ore. — A teenager who escaped from an Oregon youth prison has been arrested after police say he tried to kill a woman. Court records filed Monday show 18-year-old Brittain McAuliffe was booked into the Klamath County Jail on charges of attempte…

articles.title: Councilman and 'Babe' actor James Cromwell rip Albany corruption
articles.description: Brooklyn Councilman Jumaane Williams and  “Star Trek: First Contact”  actor James Cromwell decried Albany corruption.

articles.author: GLENN BLAIN
articles.title: State Senate backs parole reform after Herman Bell’s release
articles.description: Claiming New York’s parole system is broken, the state Senate on approved measures to make it harder for cop killers to get out of jail.

articles.title: Lawmakers start campaign to keep convicted cop killer behind bars
articles.description: State lawmakers launched a campaign to keep in jail a ex-Black Liberation Army member who was convicted of the 1971 murder of two city cops.

articles.title: Plan to close Rikers in 10 years is inadequate: commission report
articles.description: The state Commission of Correction described a “deeply disturbing and discouraging situation” at Rikers that endangered staff and inmates.

articles.title: Man accused of murdering teen after she rejected his proposal
articles.description: A Pennsylvania man is accused of strangling a teenage girl and then attacking her with a hatchet after she refused to marry him.

articles.title: Brooklyn man who attacked girlfriend, her lover held on $50G bail
articles.description: A Brooklyn judge set bail at $50,000 for a man accused of attacking his girlfriend and her lover with a metal stick spiked with nails.

articles.title: State Senate opens probe into plan to export homeless upstate
articles.description: The state Senate is opening an investigation into the de Blasio administration’s exporting of New York City homeless families to other parts of the state, The Post has learned. It was discovered last week that the city is paying a year’s rent to encourage the…

articles.title: Gov. Cuomo seeks new law cracking down on synthetic drug makers
articles.description: Gov. Cuomo Thursday said he will seek legislation to crack down further on manufacturers of synthetic pot and fentanyl.

articles.author: MAC McCLELLAND
articles.title: Feature: When ‘Not Guilty’ is a Life Sentence
articles.description: What happens after a defendant is found not guilty by reason of insanity? Often the answer is involuntary confinement in a state psychiatric hospital — with no end in sight.
